text: Petros Duryan (1851-1872) an Armenian poet and actor. His father was an blacksmith in Istanbul. He died of Tuberculosis at the age of 21. == Other websites == * Petros Duryan at ArmenianHouse.org Category:1851 births Category:1872 deaths Category:Armenian poets Category:Armenian actors Category:19th-century Asian people
title: Petros Duryan
